attributes.action: Seize and liquidate Mugabe assets in UK and repatriate proceeds to Zimbabwe
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.thesouthafrican.com/grace-left-begging-for-mugabe-university-and-millions-in-family-assets/

https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/4956879/tyrant-robert-mugabe-lives-in-luxurious-7-5million-mansion-while-his-people-starve/

Billy Rautenbach needs to be held accountable for his integral support of Mugabe's asset stripping of Zimbabwe and other African nations. 
https://www.newstatesman.com/king-leopold-lives-and-his-name-mugabe
attributes.background: Robert Mugabe plundered Zimbabwe's wealth and used it for personal gain to invest in property in Europe and UK. We, the people of Zimbabwe want those funds returned to us to rebuild ZW by selling off the Mugabe family assets.

rejection.details:
This would be the responsibility of law enforcement agencies, such as the Crown Prosecution Service, and the courts, which are independent of the Government and Parliament. 

The Crown Prosecution Service has an Asset Recovery Strategy, with a section on recovering assets on behalf of other countries, which you can find here:

https://www.cps.gov.uk/publications/docs/cps_asset_recovery_strategy_2014.pdf

The National Crime Agency explains civil recovery powers here:

http://www.nationalcrimeagency.gov.uk/about-us/what-we-do/economic-crime/civil-recovery-and-tax
